item.title: Add Axiom
item.description: https://axiom.co/ - Store up to 0.5 TB of logs with 30 day retention. Includes integrations with platforms like Vercel and advanced data querying with email/Discord notifiers.

item.title: Rename LogDNA to Mezmo
item.description: https://www.mezmo.com/ - Free for a single user, no retention, unlimited hosts and sources

item.title: Added Glob tester
item.description: https://globster.xyz/ - — A website that allows you to design and test glob patterns. It also provides resources to learn glob patterns.

item.title: Add hypercolor.dev
item.description: https://hypercolor.dev/ - A curated collection of of Tailwind CSS color gradients, also provides a variety of generators to create your own.

item.title: Added CrateDB to DBaaS
item.description: https://crate.io/lp-crfree - Distributed Open Source SQL database for real-time analytics. [Free Tier CRFREE](https://crate.io/lp-crfree): One-node with 2 CPUs, 2 GiB of memory, 8 GiB of storage. 1 cluster per organization, no payment method needed.

item.title: Add 8base serverless backend
item.description: https://www.8base.com/ - 8base is a full-stack low-code development platform built for JavaScript developers built on top of MySQL and GraphQL and serverless backend-as-a-service, it allows you to start building web applications quicky using a UI app builder and scale easily, Free tier includes: rows: 2,500, Storage: 500Mb, Serverless computing: 1Gb/h, client app users: 5.

item.title: move outsystem to low-code platform instead of BaaS
item.description: https://www.outsystems.com/ - Enterprise web development PaaS for on-premise or cloud, free "personal environment" offering allows for unlimited code and up to 1 GB database

item.title: Update Oracle, Xirsys, TigerGraph, TerminusCMS; remove deta.sh
item.description:
https://docs.oracle.com/en-us/iaas/Content/FreeTier/freetier_topic-Always_Free_Resources.htm#compute__idleinstances - be reclaimed when [deemed idle](https://docs.oracle.com/en-us/iaas/Content/FreeTier/freetier_topic-Always_Free_Resources.htm#compute__idleinstances)
https://www.tigergraph.com/cloud/ - — Managed native Graph DBMS / analytics platform with a SQL-like graph query language and a REST API. One free instance with 2 vCPU, 8GB Memory, and 50GB storage that sleeps after 1 hour of inactivity.
https://terminusdb.com/pricing - Managed free service for TerminusDB, a document and graph database written in Prolog and Rust. Free for dev, paid service for enterprise deployments and support.
https://www.xirsys.com/pricing/ - Unlimited STUN usage + 500 MB monthly TURN bandwidth, capped bandwidth, single geographic region.

item.title: add meilisearch
item.description: https://www.meilisearch.com/ - An open-source, lightning-fast, and hyper-relevant search engine that fits effortlessly into your apps, websites, and workflow. Free plan includes 100K documents and 10K searches/month.
